SOSC1350 啲reading 咁多份使唔使睇曬

quote.msg: SOSC1350 啲reading 咁多份使唔使睇曬
SOSC1350 啲reading 咁多份使唔使睇曬

replies.msg:
係時候又要想當年黎鼓勵下大家

是咁的

兩年前我就take左SOSC1350，咁呢個course就凈計attendance、midterm同final既者，而midterm同final就全MC，open notes。

咁我midterm都做得唔太好，錯左兩題，無左3.X%course grade。所以我唯有attendance take足再加final爆seed

而到左考final個日，我一起身就特別精神，考試亦做得特別快。兩個鐘既考試，我一個鐘都唔使就做晒40題MC，再加上我之後有試，咁我大概45分鐘就舉手交卷。個TA都嚇親，過黎收卷之餘仲等埋我一齊行出試場。沿路見到一班人R晒頭，仲奮鬥緊，見我提早交卷早走個種眼神，我睇得出愕然同埋羨慕。

唔知大家有無試過提早交卷肯定自己一定滿分，呢種智商上既優越感
真係好爽

咁出到去試場，個TA就問我:做好晒啦?咁早走?

但我無正面回答佢，我只係問佢: 呢個Course攞幾多percent先有A-range

TA: 未知架，要等professor定，你好有信心wo

我: 哦，無啊，問下者，今個sem多謝晒，拜拜

而我最後final 滿分 攞A+

人生試一次呢種經歷真係


Credit: @跪b

Dear members of HKUST,
 
Yesterday, colleagues and I met representatives of the provisional leadership of the HKUST Students’ Union (SU) as part of our periodic dialogue.  We discussed a wide range of issues of interest to students, including SU's budget needs. Towards the end, a petition letter as attached was presented by the students with regard to the topic of disallowing police recruitment on campus.  We noticed that an open letter of the same content had been posted on SU’s social media platform as well.
 
Same as our verbal response to the SU representatives yesterday, we wish to take this opportunity to explain and clarify the University’s position as follows.
 
A trademark of an open society is that its members can freely express diverse and opposing viewpoints with impunity. The fact that members of the Hong Kong community can articulate our various and competing opinions confirms this essential element. How can we do so? It's Hong Kong’s legal system and law enforcement establishment.  In this age of open society, there are many opportunities for anyone to scrutinize and comment on whether any police or protestors have acted inappropriately.  As a university that embraces inclusiveness and openness, banning the police to recruit on campus is as inappropriate as banning anyone disagreeing with government policies on campus.
 
We welcome continued dialogues with our students so that we can jointly support Hong Kong's future.
 
We also urge all members of the society to refrain from using profane language because such expressions downgrade the process and diminish the persuasive power.
 
 
Wei Shyy
President

11) Exam 最早考8:30AM，你一係前一晚同幾個friends book LC房過夜，每人可book 2 hours; 一係就第二朝同人搭的士返UST，你等巴士/小巴遲硬到
12) UST廁所最新最靚係CYT 2/F以上，不過冇人用，試過一次夜晩通頂做project去屙屎都幾撚驚
13) UST 有3個電腦房: Barn A, Barn B, Barn C，三者各有特色。 Barn B開24 hours, Barn C 多Engine仔用，Barn A 成日被人遺忘
